scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push
scripts.repo-publish: npm run repo-tag && cd ../../../ && ng build @voxgig/podw-angular && cd dist/voxgig/podw-angular/ && npm publish --access public
